column1: Lajeado is an important city in the valley of the Taquari River
column4: 486 (2015 est.) in an area of 90.09 kmÂ². Some of the largest distributors of food and fuel of the state are found in Lajeado. The city is mostly urban. Its current mayor is Mr. Marcelo Caumo. It was founded on January 26
